s1.message: 이 인터페이스는 Adblock Plus의 필터 관리 대화상자에서 하나의 그룹이며, 그것은 IAdblockPlus에 의해 되돌아갑니다. 모든 접근은 읽기 전용입니다.

s2.message: 참고 : 이 객체 에 대한 참조는 유지하지 않아야 합니다. 만약 이윽고 이후 어느 시점에 같은 구독 필터의 상태가 필요하다면 알맞은 정보를 얻기 위해 IAdblockPlus로부터 그것을 다시 요청해야 합니다.

urlDescription-s1.message: Subscription identifier. This can be any string for externally managed subscriptions and special groups, for other subscriptions this will be their update URL.

specialDescription-s1.message: Defines whether the subscription is a special group containing user filters. Currently there are four special groups, namely {1} (normal filters), {2} (exception rules), {3} (element hiding rules) and {4} (invalid rules).

titleDescription-s1.message: Subscription's title as displayed in the Preferences dialog

autoDownloadDescription-s1.message: Defines whether the subscription will be updated automatically. Note that this attribute is meaningless for externally managed subscriptions and special groups.

disabledDescription-s1.message: Defines whether the subscription is disabled. If this attribute is set to {1} the filters in the subscription won't be applied.

externalDescription-s1.message: Defines whether the subscription is managed externally. If this attribute is set to {1} the filters in the subscription will only be updated if some extension calls IAdblockPlus.updateExternalSubscription.

lastDownloadDescription-s1.message: Timestamp (return value of {1}) of last attempt to download the subscription. The value 0 means that the subscription was never downloaded.

downloadStatusDescription-s1.message: Result code for the last download attempt. This can have the following values:

downloadStatusDescription-s5.message: {1} — Subscription was downloaded but the first line wasn't {2}

lastModifiedDescription-s1.message: Value of the {1} HTTP header received with the last successful download. This isn't used yet and will always be empty.

getPatternsDescription-s1.message: Retrieves the list of filter rules for a subscription. Note that this method usually will not return anything useful for special groups.
